description: Try our easy to follow Ham & Chicken With Spinach & Gruyere recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Ham & Chicken With Spinach & Gruyere Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 slice jarrah honey ham off the bone

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, add flour to the same frying pan and stir over medium heat until lightly browned. Remove from heat, gradually add wine and stir well until smooth. Add stock and remaining mustard, return to heat, and stir until sauce has thickened. Strain into a warm jug. Slice chicken and serve with sauce and steamed vegetables.

Add stock and remaining mustard, return to heat, and stir until sauce has thickened. Strain into a warm jug. Slice chicken and serve with sauce and steamed vegetables.
